text: Diclofenac is a non-steroidal ant-inflammatory drug. It can be used as an analgesic and antipyretic. It is often used to treat bruises and strain injuiries. Research experiments conducted in 2013, showed that Diclofenac increased the risk of heart attacks and stroke. == References == Category:Analgesics Category:Carboxylic acids Category:Organochlorides Category:Organonitrogen compounds
title: Diclofenac
